Text.Page: Oh, this? It's my Shariar badge. It's so people know that I'm doing my part to end the argon tyranny.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"How'd you get it?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Well, you earn it, and make it, in battle.

Talk to Naveld at {@Rgn:48002}. He can set you on the path if you want one of your own.

A Shariar badge? Sure. You've killed gods! You're definitely worthy.

You'll need some mana crystals from {@LinkCreature:48#7#zariik dazzlers}, or cores from {@LinkCreature:48#5#hulrap bashers}, or even some cyasma from {@LinkCreature:48#13#syndrene dragoons}.

You bring me some of those and I'll get your pin.

Killing those argons proved you're one of us. This badge will show everyone else.

Great work, .

The mana crystals from {@LinkCreature:48#7#zariik dazzlers} aren't easy to acquire, but make fine testaments to your fighting prowess.

Why not bring me some?

Killing those argons proved you're one of us. This badge will show everyone else.

Great work, .
{@LinkCreature:48#5#Hulrap basher} cores would meet our requirements. You could lop off their heads and bring us the cores.

Killing those argons proved you're one of us. This badge will show everyone else.

Great work, .
Cyasma from {@LinkCreature:48#13#syndrene dragoons} is perfect for this sort of thing. There's just something about the way cyasma looks.
